name: page of pentacles visits the rainbow
name_original: page of pentacles visits the rainbow
description:
Instructions

wasd + space

game made as a prototype based on the page of pentacles and the ten of cups, for which I created gifs using models from models resource and mixamo animations. The gifs are on the side. Walk around to experience the janky 3rd person controller.

models used:

Prince Dreambert https://www.models-resource.com/3ds/marioluigidreamteam/model/17383/
SNES Donut Plains 3 https://www.models-resource.com/wii_u/mariokart8/model/10724/
Flower Cup Trophy https://www.models-resource.com/gamecube/mariokartdoubledash/model/36236/
Village https://www.models-resource.com/ds_dsi/finalfantasyiii/model/31593/
Daddy, Mommy, Billy and Sarah https://www.models-resource.com/wii/familypirateparty/
Coin https://www.models-resource.com/gamecube/marioparty4/model/25434/
